drcl.comp
Interface ActiveComponent

All Known Subinterfaces:
RestartableComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AODV, BulkSource, BulkSourceSink, ByteStreamNetPeer, CBT, ComponentTemplate, ComponentTester, FileSource, fspd, ftp, ftpd, Hello, Mac_802_11, MobilityModel, RNG, Talk, TargetAgent, TCP, TrafficSourceComponent, WirelessPhy
public interface ActiveComponent

Only components that implement this interface can be given an execution context to Component#_start() when Component.run()ed.
